question: An eight-months-old child had history of unusual crying, altered sensorium & convulsions following previous vaccination after BCG, DPT & OPV (first dose) & Hepatitis B. Now parents have brought child for next doses of vaccination. Which vaccine is contraindicated in this situation?
exp: Absolute contraindications to any peussis vaccination (including DTwP vaccine) are: - Anaphylaxis after previous dose. - Development of encephalopathy within 7 days following previous DTwP vaccination. - Progressive neurological disease - Relative contraindication. - Precautions: Previous dose associated with Persistent inconsolable crying of > 3 hrs, < 48hrs Hyperpyrexia (fever > 40. 5degC) hypotonic hyporesponsive episodes (HHE) within 48 hours of DTwP administration seizures with or without fever within 72 hours of administration of DTwP - These are considered as precautions but not contraindications to future doses of DTwP because these events generally do not reoccur with the next dose and they haven't been proven to cause permanent sequelae. But in case an event recurs with a subsequent dose, then fuher doses are contraindicated.

question: A 11-month-old child came for vaccination. He had received Polio vaccine & BCG at bih. What vaccines should be given to him now?
exp: - As the baby is of 11 months of age, recommend catch up immunization of all the vaccines which are due till date as per immunization schedule. - IMMUNIZATION SCHEDULE: Age Vaccine At bih BCG, b. OPV-0, Hep B-0 6 weeks b. OPV-1, Pentavalent-1, Rotavirus-1*, f. IPV-1, PCV-1* 10 weeks b. OPV-2, Pentavalent-2, Rotavirus-2* 14 weeks b. OPV-3, Pentavalent-3, Rotavirus-3*, f. IPV-2, PCV-2* 9 months MR-1*, JE-1*, PCV-B*, Vit-A 16-24 months DPT-B1, b. OPV-B, JE-2*, MR-2* 5-6 years DPT-B2 11-13 yrs HPV-1*, HPV-2* - As BCG is already given at bih, it is not necessary now Catch up schedule of impoant vaccines: - DPT (<7 years ) - Hib (<5 years) - OPV (<5 years) - BCG (<1 years) - Hep B (<1 years)
opb: Measles, DPT, OPV, Hib, Hep B

question: Immunisation with Rotavirus should be completed by the age of:
exp: - Immunization with Rotavirus should be completed by the age of 12 months. - 3 types of vaccines of rotavirus & their schedule Rotarix (RV1) - 2 doses at 10 & 14 weeks Rota. Teq ( RV5) - 3 doses at 6, 10 & 14 weeks Rotavac - 3 doses at 6, 10 & 14 weeks - This vaccination is avoided in acute gastroenteritis - Caution is taken in infants with high risk of intussusception.

question: Pre- exposure prophylaxis for rabies vaccine is given at?
exp: - Pre-exposure prophylaxis of Rabies - 3 intramuscular doses at 0, 7, 21/28 days - Post-exposure prophylaxis - on days 0, 3, 7, 14 & 28 - Essen/ WHO schedule Additional dose on day 90 - advised in immunocompromised/ severely malnourished individuals

question: A child who has not been vaccinated with H. influenzae comes to the OPD at 14 months. How many doses, including booster would you like to give to this child?
exp: Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) conjugate vaccine schedule: * Minimum age: 6 weeks - Primary series includes Hib conjugate vaccine at ages 6, 10, 14 weeks with booster at 15- 18 months of age. If the child is brought: * At 6-12 months - 2 primary doses>= 8 weeks apa & 1 booster at 15-18 months; * At 12-15 months - 1 primary dose & 1 booster; * 15-60 months - Single dose This vaccine is not recommended beyond 5yrs of age except in pts with hypo/asplenia.

question: What is the minimum age of vaccination of human papilloma virus vaccine?
exp: - Minimum age to administer HPV vaccine is 9yrs HPV vaccine: - Two vaccines licensed globally are available in India Quadrivalent vaccine (Gardasil(tm) marketed by Merck)- Protects against HPV serotypes 6, 11, 16 & 18. Bivalent vaccine (Cervarix(tm) marketed by Glaxo Smith Kline) - Protects against HPV serotypes 16 and 18. Both vaccines are manufactured by recombinant DNA technology. - These vaccines prevents cervical in situ neoplasia grade 2, 3 & adenocarcinoma in situ - Gardasil also prevents serotype related genital was, vaginal & vulvar intraepithelial neoplasia.
